item.title: proxmox ve 增加自动trim的cron job
item.author: gowinder
item.description: proxmox ve 增加自动trim的cron job 检查状态 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 sudo systemctl status fstrim.timer # output: ● fstrim.timer - Discard unused blocks once a week Loaded: loaded (/lib/systemd/system/fstrim.timer; disabled; vendor preset: enabled) Active: inactive (dead) Trigger: n/a Triggers: ● fstrim.service Docs: man:fstrim 开启服务 1 sudo systemctl start fstrim.timer 检
